cleaned_text: FEMALE BALANCE | Naturopath Blend This mild herbaceous blend of red clover, wild yam, sage, chaste tree berry, & black cohosh promotes & maintains the balance of female hormones. It aids in reducing the menopausal symptoms such as hot flushes & night sweats; PMS symptoms, & period pains. No caffeine, no additives. ***Not suitable during pregnancy. Please note: We do not offer the above as instruction, only as information. Always check with your health practitioner if you have a medical condition. If you are pregnant, you should not drink herbal tea without your doctor's consent, as some herbs can stimulate uterine contractions. BREWING GUIDE: Duration: 3-5 minutes Temperature: 100C° (full 1 tbsp per cup BREWING RECOMMENDATIONS: - If you like your tisane brewed stronger or weaker, adjust the amount of leaves than what the brewing directions call for. Brewing your tisane too long can extract an undesirable bitterness from the leaves - Tisanes can typically be steeped multiple times. However, each steeping will yield a slightly lighter flavor than the previous. - To brew in a large teapot, increase the amount of loose leaf to match the total cups of water you're using.
